Spike was totally the biggest highlight in this episode. Spike biggest bro!

Everything else was ok but not a lot going on.

And I'll be honest I still don't know what to feel about the tree. At least its THERE and they did something cute with it. 

They could have done nothing so I appreciate that they did something with it.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55294f216368724c02240400#post_55294f216368724c02240400
I tried going to sleep last night and couldn't get to sleep for the life of me. I was too excited because I _thought_ my Package was going to finally get here today. (Still fucking nothing)

So I ended up staying up all night watching the ENTIRE thing of Macross Frontier. (Good show, I recommend it)

And at that point it was 4/5 something in the morning and I knew if I slept then I would miss the new episode. So I said fuck it and stayed up even longer. 

And Now I feel dead inside. God, My sleeping schedule is ruined.


"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55294eb86368724c20520300#post_55294eb86368724c20520300
~Stalker~
